name: MTKSubmesh
desc: A container for the index data of a Model I/O submesh, suitable for use in a Metal app.

items.name: var mesh: MTKMesh?
items.desc: The parent mesh containing the vertex data of this submesh.

items.name: var indexBuffer: MTKMeshBuffer
items.desc: The index buffer used to render the submesh object.

items.name: var indexCount: Int
items.desc: The number of indices in the index buffer.

items.name: var indexType: MTLIndexType
items.desc: The type of index data in the index buffer.

items.name: var primitiveType: MTLPrimitiveType
items.desc: The primitive type with which to draw the submesh object.
